description:
ATTENTION: IF YOUR SITE IS NOT MOBILE FRIENDLY YOU WILL LOOSE >>SEO<<

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

LAST UPDATE: This Course was last updated on 25th FEB 2015 2 New Lectures were ADDED!

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

☆☆☆SPECIAL PRICE☆☆☆

Prices will go up from 69$ to 99$ on 25th of December 2015

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

What Google Says:

Google have recently been saying that in the April timeframe there is going to be a change to their ranking algorithms to put more weight on mobile friendly sites. In simple terms, this means that sites that render properly and deliver a good user experience on mobile devices will probably get a rankings boost.

DON'T BELIEVE ME? Search Yourself On Google!

NO SKILLS REQUIRED!

    1. Do You want 100% traffic ?
    2. Do You want your site to come on top of Google ?
    3. Do You want to increase SEO ?
    4. Do you want your customers to like your site ?
    5. Do you want your site to load Faster ?
    6. Do you want to Optimize WordPress for mobile

    If your Answer is YES, then this course is Perfect For you!

    Believe me after enrolling in this course not only you will increase SEO but your site will be on top of GOOGLE and your site will even load faster. If you optimize WordPress for mobile then no one can hack your site with a mobile.

    HOW WE WILL WORK?

    We will install a simple WordPress plugin and will work with that plugin until and unless our site looks professional. So guys this course is really very easy and informative too. Believe me after enrolling in this course you will be able to optimize WordPress for mobile and will get a lot of traffic as well.

    I'll walk you through every step in how to use WordPress through a series of videos. I've also included useful resource documents for you to reference.

    ~I know where you're at.

    ~I know where you're coming from.

    After taking this course you'll have a unique, professional and easy-to-use mobile optimized website to be proud of - and you'll have created it yourself!

    You can get started right after you have enrolled in my course. So just click "Take This Course" button which will be your first step optimizng an amazing WordPress website for Mobile from scratch.

    Best Of Luck!

    See you inside the course
title: Mobile Optimization for WordPress
